alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Caledonia, southern Orleans and northeastern Washington Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hardwick. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walden, Hardwick, Stannard, Greensboro Bend, Greensboro, Wheelock, Danville, East Greensboro, North Walden, South Walden, East Hardwick, and Hardwick Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
